metadata.title: CVE-2022-38850 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The MPlayer Project mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1 is vulnerable to Divide ByZero via the function config () of llibmpcodecs/vf_scale.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer-gui - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2').
